title: SalesMatch Page

description: The landing page for a mobile app. Translated Figma designs into code

title: jm.dev
description: My own personal website that showcases my skills, projects and all things ME.

title: JobListings
description: JobListings lets you list and organize all your job application all in one platform. It has a simple interface that has all your needs to keep tabs on all your job listings

title: SharedNotes
description: SharedNotes is a website that stores notes, either private or shared, reminders and tasks. Its note editor has added functionalities found in modern text editors. It’s a full stack application utilizing Vite-React for client and Firebase as its backend.

title: Traveloga API
description: Traveloga-api is a REST API for list of available airports around the world with their price of tickets for every corresponding tourist destination in the Philippines. (NOTE: This is not entirely factual. List of airports are valid but reduced, while prices are just guesses).

title: Traveloga
description: Traveloga is a website that allows you to book some famous tourists spots within the Philippines. It’s a full stack application built with Create-React-App and has its own REST API, Authentication and Database storage for users and their bookings.

title: node_express_practice
description: A list of Node and Express projects that I followed through. Made by John Smilga from Coding Addict

title: Tahanan
description: Tahanan is a simple e-commerce website that sells furniture. It's made from HTML, CSS and Javascript. It is one of my earliest projects.
